body:
Overview

You can cancel a scheduled HackerRank interview. Once you cancel the interview, HackerRank automatically sends email notifications to the respective Candidate and the interviewer(s) informing them about the cancelation.

Cancel an Interview

Prerequisites

  • You must have created and scheduled an interview.
  1. On the HackerRank for Work home page, click on the Interview tab. Here you can find a list of the interviews. 
  2. Click on the three dots next to the scheduled interview you want to cancel.
  3. Click Delete Interview. 
  4. The following message is displayed to confirm the cancellation.
  5. Click Delete. 
  6. The selected interview is canceled, and the entry is deleted from the interview's list.
title: Canceling an Interview
